alert.note: Alert for Darke; Miami; Shelby (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 4:15AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN SHELBY, NORTHERN DARKE AND NORTHWESTERN MIAMI COUNTIES THROUGH 445 AM EDT... At 415 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Union City, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail and frequent cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Lightning can cause serious injury or death. Locations impacted include... Piqua, Greenville, Versailles, Covington, Newport, Bradford, Union City, Fort Loramie, Ansonia, Hardin, Webster, Russia, Gettysburg, Osgood, North Star, Rossburg, Lockington, Yorkshire, Polo and Newbern. This includes I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 80 and 83. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. When thunder roars, go indoors! Do not stay in the open or seek shelter under trees when lightning threatens. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
